author: staff@bgr.com (Yoni Heisler)
title: Tesla Missed Out On Billions By Selling Bitcoin Too Early
description: Tesla made billions selling off a significant portion of its Bitcoin stock, but it could have made far more if it waited longer to sell.
content: Earlier this week, Bitcoin reached an all-time high of $120,000. Suffice it to say, if Tesla held on to its Bitcoin, it could have made billions more. Assuming that Tesla sold 32,000 Bitcoin, and givâ€¦ [+1215 chars]
